      • loadPotentialCustomersIntoCustomerCare

        public void loadPotentialCustomersIntoCustomerCare()
        Loads potential customers who need care into the CustomerCare table.

        This method identifies potential customers based on specific conditions (e.g., status is "Mới" or "Tiềm năng", remind dates, and latest interaction dates), and inserts them into the crm_customer_care table if they are not already present.

        Specified by:
        loadPotentialCustomersIntoCustomerCare in interface mks.myworkspace.crm.service.CustomerCareService
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if there are no potential customers to insert, or if an error occurs during insertion.
